2025-05-08.title: Netflix investors unfazed by tariffs with growth engine humming
2025-05-08.description: Not even the threat of massive tariffs on films has been enough for investors to question Netflix's prospects. Find out more

2025-05-14.title: CRTC kicks off CanCon hearing as big streamers cancel appearances
2025-05-14.description: OTTAWA — The CRTC launched a hearing about drafting a new definition for Canadian content Wednesday, but three big American streaming companies dropped off the schedule at the last minute. Netflix, Paramount and Apple cancelled their individual appearances, w…
